# Security Policy

### Supported Versions

#### HumHub Versions
| Versions | Supported |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.15.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.14.x   | :x: |

#### PHP Versions
| HumHub Versions | Supported |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 8.2.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 8.1.x   | :x: |
| 8.0.x   | :x: |

### Reporting a Vulnerability
If there are any vulnerabilities please report them to security@greenmeteor.net
